text: He plays beautifully and lyrically... The enthusiastic audience would not let the band leave without an encore, they knew they had seen something special.
Fusion was not forsaken; the band dissected the more exploratory side of the genre
A very exciting concert of brand new music... A line-up including the cream of London-based young jazz talent.

source: The Magazine of the American Songbook Association
text: The singer was superbly supported... If I Were A Bell was delivered with a piano to die for
